short_summary: The Department of National Defense (DND) invites proposals from qualified "expédition de fret" providors for the supply of supplies to be transported
description: The DND seeks provides to supply transportation requirements for freight forwarding and / or shipments, with requirements activation dates until 2025. A Notice of proposed procurement (NPP) was issued in order to obtain official access to the procurement, which was developed to facilitate direct contracting with the industry for the supply of goods and/or services...
